Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ngakube yileNkulumo yini nina eningakholelwa kuyona
Futhi nenza isabelo senu ukuthi kube ukwenqaba kwenu
Manjalo kungani uma (umphefumulo uphuma) ufinyelela emninzweni
Futhi thina siseduzane kakhulu kuyena kunani kepha aniboni
Manjalo kungani ningenzi – uma kungukuthi nina angeke nehlulelwe
Manjalo ukuphumula nezabelo kanye nesivande senjabulo
Ngakho-ke dumisa igama leNkosi yakho, enkulu
Ungowakhe umbuso wamazulu nomhlaba uyaphilisa futhi uyabulala futhi yena wenza zonke izinto
Yena ungowokuqala nowokugcina nosobala nosithele futhi yena uyisazi sazozonke izinto
